content.en: Forest Dynamics Monitoring: Scientists have been using algorithms to study and monitor forest dynamics in various regions around the world. These algorithms, such as the vegetation change tracker (VCT), Landsat Time Series Stack-Vegetation Change Tracker (LTSS-VCT), LandTrendr, and Breaks For Additive Season and Trend (BFAST) Monitor, are helping researchers track forest disturbances and recovery over time. By analyzing satellite data and using data-driven approaches, these algorithms are providing valuable insights into how forests are changing and recovering in response to different factors.
content.da: Overvågning af skovdynamik: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at studere og overvåge skovdynamik i forskellige regioner rundt om i verden. Disse algoritmer, såsom vegetation change tracker (VCT), Landsat Time Series Stack-Vegetation Change Tracker (LTSS-VCT), LandTrendr og Breaks For Additive Season and Trend (BFAST) Monitor, hjælper forskere med at spore skovforstyrrelser og genvinding over tid. Ved at analysere satellitdata og bruge datastyrede tilgange giver disse algoritmer værdifulde indsigter i, hvordan skove ændrer sig og genvinder sig som reaktion på forskellige faktorer.
